overview:
Sean is the founder of The Finders Ventures, a start-up company based in Singapore specializing in finder services.

He started www.FindaHomeLoan.sg, a home loan portal, to bring further transparency, clarity and bringing home buyers and property investors in the Singapore market closer to the banks and financial institutions. It is an independent and unbiased service that is free to use yet bringing value to customers.

www.FindaHomeLoan.sg is developed using open-source CMS and the latest technologies, to maximise the user experience. Coupled with social media functionalities, it allows the sharing of home loan products with everyone.
